name: Drift Classics Car Drifting
description:
Now is the time to Drift some retro cars and hot rods from the 1900s.

Simple retro cars or hot rods, doesn't matter. The question is: will it drift? And the answer is YES. Go and have fun with these classic beasts and remember! Always go sideways.

CARS:

10 classics each with unique real car sounds a mixture of v8s and v12s, but first you start out with a 4 banger just to get the feel of it and learn to drift. More cars are coming in future updates.

PAINT:

50 paint colors in the variation of matte, glossy, and metallic so your car can really be unique.

CUSTOMIZATION:

17 retro rims. The rims and can purchased and equiped to your cars. The rims can also be painted to any color. The cars and rims are paintable separately.

TRACKS:

3 tracks are available but more will be coming in future updates. The first track is a wide spot so you can sharpen your skills and earn money easier. It is a gymkhana like playground where you can maximize your drifting skills. The following tracks require a bit more technique but you can get prepared at the gymkhana spot.

DRIFTING:

You have 3 minutes in each round to show what you can do. You receive money based on your performance. Every car has unique handling and sound which makes the whole experience more enjoyable and each drift feels different.

LEADERBOARDS:

Your scores are submitted to worldwide leaderboards, so you can check how you did and how others perform.

Hope you enjoy the game, if you have any question or ideas don't hesitate to contact us via e-mail.
